segments.text: Hello . This is the Customer service . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I ’ Ve been getting harassing calls recently . Can I have my phone number changed ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . What ’ s your favorite number ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sorry . This number has already been registered .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This number is ok . It ’ s still available . When would you like your phone number changed ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As soon as possible . Can I have it right now ?
segments.speaker: S2
